subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Diskerud, 24, bolsters a midfield — and a club — trying to regain its footing since the announcement that another of the team’s high-profile signings would not arrive until July.
snippet: Diskerud, 24, bolsters a midfield — and a club — trying to regain its footing since the announcement that another of the team’s high-profile signings would not arrive until July.
